(OCC: Yanshosh, I was simply saying that my characters can't do anything if
I have to wait for Liono because Iron Raptor won't do anything. Anyway, the
People's Group are with the Maximals.) Dracona grabs Plinttissa and jumps
out of the way of the grenade, avoiding it, but landing on her foot and
wrenching it. Dracona cried out in pain. "Iron Raptor, I request permission
for me and my paartner to use the CR Chamber." Dracona said, looking at
Plintissa...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 04, 2000 9:06 PM
Subject: Re: (unknown)


> TheCode, considering you have no maximal characters, you have no authority
> about maximal leadership. Declaring Iron Raptor leader is something you
have
> no authority to do, it'd have to be done through the RPG.
>
> ::Zardus/Zenyak::
>
> Zardus recieves Punch's transmission. For once he was thankfull that
> DevilDuer had caused him to set his comm-link to play back messages only
in
> his head, or he'd have a lot of trouble explaining that statement to the
> predacons in front of him.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Zenyak falls behind a boulder, cursing whoever descovered fire beams. He
rubs
> his leg, slightly thankful for the ice that Dracona had shot at him, which
> was cooling the wound.
>
> He growls, looking at the crowd with the giant bot in the middle of them.
>
> It was time to leave, he could see that, the maximals should soon start
> firing on each other.
>
> He smiles. He couldn't possibly leave without a goodbye gift. Zenyak takes
> out a photon grenade.
>
> Chuckling, the predacon pulls the pin and throws it into the middle of
Iron
> Raptor and company, turning to run like his life depended on it and
ducking
> his head as he hears the grenade explode.
>
> Finally detecting Zenyak, the autoguns open fire.
>
